column1: Smoque BBQ////Sides:  The fries are excellent and they give you a big-ass paper bag of them.  Forget ketchup--just dip them straight in the barbecue sauce.  The macaroni and cheese is small and...well
column2: the only disappointment of the meal.  Too thin and not cheesy enough
column3: and the cornmeal is a texture that I found unpleasant.  Oh well.  I loved the tangy
column4: peppery cole slaw despite my general aversion to vinegar-based slaws.  I tried a bite of baked beans but they are too sweet for me.  Tone down the sugar and I would love them; they are interesting and close to greatness.
